name: Twinstream Shark
text:
2 Level 4 Fish monsters
(Quick Effect): If all monsters you control are WATER Xyz monsters, you can detach any number of Xyz materials, then apply that effect equal to the number detached;
1 - Special Summon 1 WATER monster in your GY in face-up defense position.
2 - Target 1 monster your opponent controls; shuffle that target into the Deck.
You can only activate the effect of "Twinstream Shark" once per turn.
